dct_title_s: Map of the lower portion of the Mahoning River Basin showing availability of underground water
dct_alternative_sm: Ohio water plan inventory. Underground water resources. Mahoning River Basin (Lower portion)
dct_description_sm: Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.
Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the lower Mahoning River Basin and quality of underground water.
"Prepared by JAMES W. CUMMINS, Geologist, Ohio Division of Water"
Scale bar lower right corner of map.
